commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: The first contest is a race between Rin and Setsu! Give it your all, you two!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Okay!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I will do my best!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Why is Setsuna up against Rin? This was supposed to be a battle between Setsuna and me!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Well, that's just how the ladder works.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Kasumi, I promise that our duel will be settled before this is over, so please allow me to focus on this battle for now!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whoa, you're totally in the zone now. Okay, but don't you forget it!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: The first person to do a whole lap around the rink and make it back here is the winner. Okay?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Yup! I'm gonna skate my heart out!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: That's the spirit! Perhaps we should hear a few words about how you feel going into this, Rin. Do you mind?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: A-A few words?! Wh-Whoa! Like a real athlete?! U-Um, I haven't really skated much on ice before, so I'm a little nervous...

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: But I love races! So whether it be on land or on ice, no one's gonna catch me with how fast I go! Please cheer me on!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Thank you, Rin! Next up, Setsu! A few words, please.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Right! I have prepared myself perfectly in the lead up to today, and have left no stone unturned. I am focused on the glory at the finish line! Victory will be mine!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Ooh, I can see the passionate fire burning in your eyes, Setsu. That's the passion I'd expect of someone who urged us to melt the very rink itself!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Now that we know how you both feel leading up to the race, let's begin!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You can do it, Rin!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I'm cheering for you, Setsuna. Good luck!

commands.speaker: Setsuna, Rin
commands.line: Setsuna: Thank you! Rin: Will do!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Are you both primed and ready? We're about to get started!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Ready... Go!

commands.speaker: Setsuna, Rin
commands.line: Setsuna: Hah! Rin: Mya!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whoa, th-they're both really fast! They've raced on ahead in a flash!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I cannot record a loss from my very first match! As such, I will be skating at full speed from start to finish!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: You're incredible, Setsuna! But I'm not gonna go down without a fight either! Here I gooooo!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Huh?! R-Rin! What is this immense acceleration?! Argh! I can push further still!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Ahahahaha! Whee! I'm having so much fun!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: This is totally different from racing on land! Each step sends me gliding right off! The cold wind feels so good!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I feel like I could go anywhere like this!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Rin has such a bright smile on her face! It sparkles with radiant beauty, just like the protagonist of the anime when she first skated across the ice!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: The winner of the race is... Rin Hoshizora of Otonokizaka!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Thank you very much!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Yay! You won, Rin!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh my gosh, that was so amaz... I-I mean, I guess that wasn't a bad performance.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You were so close. I thought you were gonna win for sure.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I did not think for a moment that I would lose. It is an incredible shame that I have lost. I am sorry.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: However, I do not have any regrets, as I saw something right before my eyes that shined brighter than any gold medal ever could.
